<Text>The Wing Shuttle
1:
--------------------
Text: Wing Shuttle:  The system opened on September 4, 1994, with the opening of the airport itself.
Triplets:<Wing Shuttle
4:
--------------------
<Text: Wing Shuttle:  Unlike the wheel-less Terminal 2 Shuttle System in Narita International Airport, the system in Kansai is a conventional people mover with wheels.>
Triplets:<Wing Shuttle
5:
--------------------
Text: Wing Shuttle:  Cars operate roughly once every 2 minutes and each route is 545m long.
